content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed "average.py" again and got the message "The average of the numbers is: 3.0". Attempted "get_hyperlinks" but it failed due to returning too much output. I created a new file "new_file.txt" with "write_to_file" and deleted it with "delete_file". I read the contents of "productive_things_to_do.txt" and appended "- Practice mindfulness and meditation." to it. Then I replaced the first occurrence of "Practice mindfulness and meditation." with "Practice mindfulness, meditation, and yoga." in the same file. Finally, I deleted "productive_things_to_do.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: The website I found provides a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.This is an updated log entry.This is a new log entry.\nThis is another productive thing to do: Learn a new language!This is another productive thing to do: Learn a new musical instrument!\n- Research legal resources for upcoming case and prepare outline.", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'featured_article.txt', '<filename>', 'eisenhower_box_notes.txt', 'productive_things_to_do.txt', 'clockify_info.txt', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area_calculation.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/generate_password.py', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt", "text": "- Practice mindfulness and meditation."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt", "old_text": "Practice mindfulness and meditation.", "new_text": "Practice mindfulness, meditation, and yoga.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/productive_things_to_do.txt updated successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename":
